problem_text_cn: 如图,扇形AOB的圆心角为直角,正方形OCDE内接于扇形,点C、E、D分别在OA、OB、AB上,过点A作AF⊥ED交ED的延长线于F,垂足为F．如果正方形的边长OC为1,那么阴影部分的面积为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the central angle of the sector-shaped AOB is a right angle, the square OCDE is inscribed in the sector, and the points C, E, and D are respectively on OA, OB, and AB, and the extended line of AF ⊥ ED intersecting ED at F, and the vertical foot is F. If the edge length OC of the square is N_0, then the area of ​​the shaded part is ()
raw_answer: 解:易得两个矩形全等,∵OC=1,∴由勾股定理得OA=√{2},∴S_{阴影}=S~矩形~=(√{2}-1)×1=√{2}-1,故选:A．
raw_comment: 本题考查了扇形面积的计算,正方形的性质以及勾股定理,是基础知识比较简单．
